title: Greater worker productivity shifts MRP right

content.question: The graph above shows the marginal revenue product curve and supply curve of labor for a firm. The introduction of new management techniques dramatically increases workers productivity. Which of the following changes is most likely to occur?

choices.label: The supply curve will shift to the left, increasing the wage rate.
The supply curve will shift to the right, increasing employment.
The marginal revenue product curve will shift to the right, increasing wage rate.
The marginal revenue product curve will shift to the left, reducing employment.
Neither the marginal revenue product curve nor the supply curve will shift, but the wage will increase and employment will fall.

content.answer: The marginal revenue product curve will shift to the right, increasing wage rate.
